description: In this course you could learn how to download, installa and SETUP from the basics the Nik Software Plugin Collection (now free from Google!) and start to manage some tricks to make your work easy and fast! You will learn a PRO WORKFLOW that fit perfect on Adobe Photoshop CC or Lightroom CC made easy with this plugin suite collection. Powerful way for AMATEUR and PROFESSIONAL PHOTOGRAPHER. I'm using Nik Software since many years and my workflow is 900% faster than before. Also if you are PRO with Photoshop this works! Two type of Students in Nik Software Course: A) Users that aren't able to make this magical trick B) Users skilled to do that hisself by trhilled to make the same results in 1/10 time! Take a free tour and se why this is my Italian Best Seller VideoCourse!
title: Nik Software : Color Efex Pro 2 from Basics to Pro Workflow
